title: Dacey asks: What if cats lived in outer space
description:
Mike Rylander joins us, playing a whole slew of characters in a space odyssey you won’t soon forget… and keep an eye out for FREDZORB THE DESTROYER.

Lessons: All people deserve to be treated equally; dogs and cats CAN get along ;)

This episode first aired October 14th, 2019.

Find out more about our special guest, Mike Rylander, actor, improviser, narrator, and dad: mikerylander.com

Join our Patreon for Ad-Free stories, a Shout-Out on the show, a better chance of having your question answered, and more! patreon.com/whatifworld

Subscribe to What If World wherever you listen: link.chtbl.com/whatifworld. Share questions or artwork with a grownup's help via twitter @whatifworldpod, fb & insta @whatifworldpodcast, email whatifworldpodcast@gmail.com, or snail mail:

What If World (or Mr. Eric)

P.O. Box 4905

Panorama City, CA 91412

What If World is made by Eric and Karen O'Keeffe. A big thanks to our associate producer Miss Lynn, who helps in a million ways and did graphic design for this week’s art. Our podcast art is by Jason O’Keefe and our theme song is by Craig Martinson.
